Ratings.comment: Professor Vasques himself is hilarious and a great professor. I liked the class okay but my biggest gripe was the moderate amount of abstract math in the homework. I just felt like I didn't get much out of it as I liked to learn mostly just conceptual details. If you're interested in Nuclear engineering or maybe a Nuke minor definitely take it.

This class was interesting and a lot of fun, especially the tour of the reactor on campus. There are five homeworks, which he will help you with after class or during office hours. Then there are two midterms that are take home. No finals.

Dr. Vasques was an unbelievable professor. Strived to see his students succeed. Very accommodating, very available to help students with homework and specifically guide them. There every step of the way, very approachable, effectively communicated course material. Would definitely recommend him and this course. Great intro into the Nuclear field!
